name: Brandworks Detroit
tagline: There’s Value In Having The Right Team.
description: Brandworks is an Ann Arbor agency with a passion for business-to-business marketing. We're experienced brand-builders... planners, writers, designers. We’re creative, agile and energetic. Most of all, we’re committed to helping our clients compete. We specialize in aligning B2B brands with their business goals and objectives. It’s a collaborative, step-by-step process. It engages the best energies of your company and ours. And it yields quantifiable, business-building results.
